completion: We promise a new machine (electronic surface-single thermal printer) First, our machine is guaranteed for one year, the printer is not artificially guaranteed for one year, and the print head is guaranteed for three months (or the printing mileage reaches 30km, whichever comes first as the warranty time ) Any quality problems during the warranty period, free repair. Second, you only need to pay one-way freight to send to the factory for repair. (The factory is in Zhejiang) Third, we promise to return and exchange the goods within 7 days without any reason.

completion: TP730 or TP518 print one-page slips, two-page slips and labels in the width range of 40 to 100 mm (the machine can only use thermal self-adhesive paper) linked to the computer for use

Express slips only support Fenghuo delivery The software can only be connected to one mobile phone, and the previous Bluetooth connection needs to be disconnected when other mobile phones are connected to the printer (Doudian Baba is not supported when the mobile phone is Bluetooth).
